#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
set<int> s;
vector<int> children[100005];
int color[100005],ans = 0;

void func(int p,set<int> &s)
{
    for(int i = 0; i < children[p].size() ; ++i){
        set<int> s2;
        func(children[p][i],s2);
        set_union(s.begin(),s.end(),s2.begin(),s2.end(),inserter(s,s.begin()));
        s2.clear();
    }
    s.insert(color[p]);
    ans += s.size();
}
int main()
{
    int n,k,i,p;
    scanf(" %d %d",&n,&k);
    for(i=2;i<=n;++i){
        scanf(" %d",&p);
        children[p].push_back(i);
    }
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i){
        scanf(" %d",&color[i]);
    }
    func(1,s);
    cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}
